subject: Question about purchase through amazon
description_text:
Hi I bought your pedals through amazon and had a few questions
I wanted to buy the Plus X pedals P3-H3-backplate  but on amazon it says
they are Pro pedals and I just wanted to make sure I bought the correct
pedals
[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]
Another question I had was about your shipping, on your website it says
shipping is 3-7 days while on amazon it is about two weeks so I just wanted
to see if the 3-7 days shipping is to be expected through amazon.
Appreciate your help thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrick Antolak,  It depends on which country you are in. Our US warehouse currently has stock available and can ship within 24 hours. Both UPS and FedEx offer fast delivery. The German warehouse is experiencing some delays due to customs clearance, with a small backlog of orders, but new stock is expected to be available in the next few days. Please don’t worry.
